> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **christmas trees washcloth** this pattern combines the intarsia crochet technique with the wide half-double_crochet stitch wide half_double_crochet creating satisfying clean lines that bring the christmas tree motif to life if you ve never tried intarsia before don t worry once you get the hang of the color changes it s easy the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth 118yds / 109m * approx 87yds / 80m for white 16yds / 15m for wasabi and 15yds / 14m for opal green * * tea towel 474yds / 434m * approx 443yds / 405m for white 16yds / 15m for wasabi and 15yds / 14m for opal green * *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton
